Skills\n Kotlin; Java; MVVM; View Model; View Binding; Glide; Retrofit; Rest Api; Google Api; Jetpack Compose; Kotlin Coroutines; Navigation Components; Dagger Hilt; Koin; Room; UI/UX Design; RxJava; RxAndroid.
January 2022 - May 2022 Oxford English Course(B1)\n 2020 - 2021 ZNTU "Computer Engineering"

Use technologies: Kotlin; Java; MVVM; View Model; View Binding; Glide; Retrofit; Rest Api; Google Api; Jetpack Compose; Kotlin Coroutines; Navigation Components; Dagger Hilt; Koin; Room; UI/UX Design; RxJava; RxAndroid.
 Projects: 
 1. GPS - an application where you can make the path from the starting point to the final.
 2. Wallpaper - an application where you can find wallpapers for you smartphone for every taste.
The application is a directory that helps graduates 11 classes prepare for the exam in the Ukrainian language and literature.

An application that helps students of medical universities structuring knowledge of histology.The directory contains all the necessary terms to study this item.It is possible to add to "Favorites" and also has a section with the necessary contractions of terms.
The application is notepad for records of your ideas, affairs and thoughts. Always at hand. Comfortable and understandable interface and easy use.
